attacks.name: Energy Blast
attacks.description: 4 slow moving energy blasts that travel forward.

attacks.name: Energy Lance
attacks.description: 8 fast moving energy blasts that travel forward slightly tracking the player, spawning on half-beats.

attacks.name: Spawn Skulls
attacks.description: Spawns 3 homing skulls that can be destroyed with weapons.  Draugr lays down his axe to cast this.

attacks.name: Demi Flare
attacks.description: Attack the right, left, right, and left side of the screen on the 1st, 3rd, 5th, and 7th beat.  Dodgeable.
